alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Flagler and southeastern St. Johns Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 215 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saint Augustine South to near Palm Coast. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Bunnell, Saint Augustine Beach, Marineland, Vilano Beach, South Ponte Vedra, Crescent Beach, Saint Augustine Shores and Butler Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
